TEXT.English: Hello, [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE] at your service. A fellow world leader is always welcome at my base of operations, of course! I hope we will have many profitable business ventures together, [CT_NAME].
Your common sense for diplomacy is lacking, [CT_NAME]. I do not think we have anything to gain from your business proposals at this time.
